title: Nursing Practice Competency Enhancement: Transformational Leadership Development for Organizational Learning Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can improve team knowledge-sharing climate by ≥30% through applying transformational leadership elements
Learners can write a project report analyzing organizational learning influence factors using structural equation modeling
Design a trust-based collaborative system to improve work efficiency metrics by 20%
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
